de.eikeb.jcsv.writer
Interface CSVWriter<E>

Type Parameters:
E - The type of the records
All Superinterfaces:
Closeable, Flushable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CSVWriterImpl
public interface CSVWriter<E>
extends Closeable, Flushable

The CSVWriter writes objects of type E to a csv file.

writeAll

void writeAll(List<E> data)
              throws IOException
Writes the data into the specified character output stream. Calls write(E e) multiple times to write each entry.

Parameters:
data - List of Es
Throws:
IOException
